title: About Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry
subtitle: Understanding the OpenTelemetry Collector architecture and features

abstract.para: This document provides an overview of Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry, including the OpenTelemetry Collector for unified telemetry data collection and processing. Learn about deploying and managing the Collector, workload instrumentation capabilities, and use cases for metrics, traces, and logs in cloud-native environments.
